author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Merit Medical Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.13
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Merit Medical Systems Inc:
* MERIT MEDICAL REPORTS RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017; MERIT MEETS RANGE OF 2017 GUIDANCE; GIVES 2018 GUIDANCE
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.33
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 21 PERCENT TO $190.9 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.57 TO $1.69
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.77 TO $0.85 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $838 MILLION TO $851 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.32, REVENUE VIEW $187.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.51, REVENUE VIEW $822.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
